entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No completion for parameter names inside `nameof` in attributes #65419
  • when a function includes both a ref and out parameter CS8352 is now thrown #65417
  • Analyzer / generator shadow load directory needs to be per user on Unix #65415
    17.5
  • CI: Analyzer tests are never run on Linux #65412
  • Make ReferenceLocation.IsWrittenTo public #65408
  • Warning about null value while value is set as not null #65406
  • Add IDExxx rule for converting multiline string to raw string #65405
  • Pasting properly formatted code breaks formatting #65404
  • `var` keyword colorized on the case `scoped var refStruct = expr;` #65403

Closed

  • Semantic snippets: in async context `cw` snippet produces code that is not getting simplified #64923
    Backlog
  • IDE0052 is incorrectly reported for a member referenced by nameof(...) #65379
    17.5
  • `CheckFeatureAvailability` should not have side-effects on binding via `hasErrors` in `ForEachLoopBinder` #65363
    17.5
  • No Public API for top-level nullability of members #64123
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix reading indent style and indent size from VS settings #65420
    Area-IDE
  • Clarify breaking change for safe-to-escape of ref struct returned from method invocation #65418
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Move SRM to 6.0.1 #65416
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.5
  • List breaking changes in .NET 8 #65414
    Area-Compilers
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65413
    Area-Compilers
  • Prepare lambda defaults/`params` for merging to `main` #65409
    Area-Compilers
  • Work some 'scoped' issues on IDE #65407
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Semantic snippets - don't need to add fully qualified name in syntax generation #65318
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Prevent FileNotFoundException #65402
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65421
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65422
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65370
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Complete all foreach binding checks despite LangVer check #65366
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #65400
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Semantic Snippets - else snippet #65178
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.5 #65374
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main-vs-deps back to main #65373
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • Improve `NormalizeWhitespace` for object initializers #65249
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Pass in HostServices when creating the LSP server #65384
    Area-IDE
  • Fix flaky test #65383
    Area-IDE
  • Report structural lambda `params` errors #64960
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix reading indent style and indent size from VS settings #65382
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Document defaults/`params` delegate type inference breaking change #65300
    Area-Compilers
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers, Blocked
  • Report analyzer telemetry for lightbulb code path in OOP #65212
    Area-Analyzers
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #65385
    Area-Compilers
  • Enhance rule metadata and suppression info in SARIF V2 errorlog #64277
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
